name: MEMOTEST (mfontanadev)
description:
Memotest:

By @mfontanadev (https://mfontanadev.github.io/).

Thanks to: @DavidWehle

Description:

It is an imitation of the a real game called Memotest, programed with QuickBasic 4.5, monochromatic displays (those times).

You have to discover two pictures that are equals, there are many of them. You can play with five of your friends at the same time.

Motivation: share with the humanity and avoid that this will be lost in my backups.

Install instructions

0-You have a readme file inside de zip. Basically is something like this:

1-See doc folder for translation from Spanish to English.

2-It works on Windows, Linux (not compatible), Mac (not compatible).

3-Unzip MEMOTEST file and run "play_minimized.bat" (this will fire DOSBox-0.72)

NOTE: this game use an emulator of DOS (an old operating system) called DOSBox-0.72 to switch into monochromatic screen resolution and to allow execute the .exe old file.

No much to tell about, this time there is no source code.
